data.title: Kid Rock Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Kid Rock with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Despite his urban rap lyrics, he grew up in a suburban, lakefront home, with chores that included picking apples from the family orchard and feeding horses

Started out as a DJ at parties and clubs in and around Detroit

Appeared with diminutive sidekick Joe C

on a 2000 episode of The Simpsons

While in Baghdad to sign autographs for the troops in 2003, put on an impromptu concert using instruments designated for a military band

Cover art for his 2006 live album, Live Trucker, pays tribute to Bob Seger's Live Bullet

Supports the charity Operation Homefront, which benefits military families
